thread.title: Fiddlers Creek offering New Inventory Homes by Ashton Woods in Marsh Cove
thread.title_full: Fiddlers Creek offering New Inventory Homes by Ashton Woods in Marsh Cove - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Fiddlers Creek offering New Inventory Homes by Ashton Woods in Marsh Cove
text:
Fiddler’s Creek announced that construction is nearly complete on two new inventory homes in Marsh Cove, a gated village which will initially feature 112 single-family residences within the luxury master-planned community located on Collier Boulevard on the way to Marco Island.
Naples, FL (PRWEB) October 10, 2015
Fiddler’s Creek announced that construction is nearly complete on two new inventory homes in Marsh Cove, a gated village which will initially feature 112 single-family residences within the luxury master-planned community located on Collier Boulevard on the way to Marco Island.
National homebuilder Ashton Woods is offering the inventory homes, which represent the Sevilla and Cantabria floor plans. Featuring Spanish Colonial-inspired architecture and expansive outdoor living areas, both homes offer stunning views of creeks and the Fiddler’s Creek championship golf course and are expected to be complete this summer.
The Sevilla is a one-story residence offering 2,570 air-conditioned square feet and 3,488 total square feet. The home is designed for livability and allows room for personalization with three bedrooms and three baths. The residence also features a spacious great room with adjoining kitchen and dining areas, a courtyard, and an outdoor living area with pool and summer kitchen. The home’s three-car garage is standard and includes three individual doors for convenient access. The Sevilla inventory home is priced at $1,090,107.
The Cantabria is a single-story design offering 3,048 air-conditioned square feet and 4,033 total square feet with an open floor plan that includes three bedrooms, three and one-half baths, and a formal dining room that may be used as a study. The residence also offers a large, open family room and outdoor living area with pool and summer kitchen. The home’s three-car garage features separate doors. The Cantabria inventory home is priced at $1,052,921.
Each home in the village of Marsh Cove is built of structurally engineered reinforced concrete block wall construction with high-profile concrete roof tiles and concrete pavers. Interior design features include luxurious kitchens with custom-made Veneta Cucine cabinets and KitchenAid appliances, 10-inch baseboards throughout the main floor, insulated impact windows, and a number of energy-efficient features throughout.
Fiddler’s Creek is an award-winning residential community that has been selected by the readers of the Naples Daily News and Bonita Daily News as “Best Community” in the Southwest Florida Readers’ Choice Awards.
Amenities include the 54,000-square-foot Club & Spa at Fiddler’s Creek, a fitness center, tropical lagoon-style swimming complex, tennis courts, and both casual and elegant dining. The Club & Spa offers a luxurious resort lifestyle and hosts numerous community-wide parties and special events for residents of all ages.
Fiddler’s Creek residents have the opportunity to join The Golf Club , featuring The Creek Course, a championship golf course ranked in Golfweek’s 100 Best Residential Golf Courses in the U.S. for the 10th consecutive year. Residents of the master-planned community also have the opportunity to join The Tarpon Club, which offers a VIP beach and boating experience that includes beach access at the Marco Beach Ocean Resort, ranked among the Top Resorts in the U.S. by Travel + Leisure’s World’s Best Awards. A limited number of non-resident annual and seasonal memberships, with term date flexibility, are currently available at both The Golf Club and The Tarpon Club.
For membership details and more information on this gated golf course community in Naples, offering move-in-ready and new homes, call 239-732-9300, stop by the Fiddler’s Creek Information Center at 8152 Fiddler’s Creek Parkway, or visit fiddlerscreek.com .
